welcome_message_body: Welcome to Comalcalco, Mexico! Get ready to experience the charm of this historic city, known for its ancient Mayan ruins and delicious cuisine. We hope you enjoy exploring all that Comalcalco has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Cocina Chontal
restaurants.description: Cocina Chontal is a restaurant located in Comalcalco.
restaurants.address: Ranchería Ejido Buena Vista 1 RA Sección, 86300 Comalcalco, Tabasco
